elements.text: You are the third and final candidate to be interviewed for a job. The interview panel greets you as you walk into the conference room. When you sit down, you feel your cheeks burning red, and you start to shake. The panel probably sees you as...

elements.name: An interview panel_Work/Career Development_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
